item.title: How it is being a Data Scientist: One year into the job
item.author: Author
item.description: What is it like working as a Data Scientist? Generally speaking, I do not know. But I can share my first hand experience having just passed the one year mark into the job. Of course, it was different to what I expected. I have coded far less super auto-magical machines, and I got caught up in far too much unplanned work. I learnt about the importance of contextual factors and team work. First things first, let me start with how I have gotten into this.
